Articles.Content:
I'm excited for *EVERYTHING!!*
Both stuff that KSP 1 doesnt have, as well as excited to see the improvements on stuff it DOES have.

Sooo... basically... *JUST EXCITED!*
the extra large landing legs so my landers don't fall over as much.

hyped for the release!

and good luck to the devs!

I am extremely exited to find out the secrets of life on lapat, I have heard that it will be an planet with big life there, so I would like to try it out and stream it. The other comment with email [email protected] was mine as well

I for one am excited to welcome our new ginormous plushy Kerbal Overlords...

 

Note the normal kerbal down there...
Everything?
I'm rather excited for the workspaces system, and being able to save an entire station and all of it's carrier rockets in a single file and launch them separately
Mostly excited with the new looks and mostly the WINGS i wanted costumizable wing for sooooooo long
I'm excited for better performance!
I am excited for the 100 planets that are gonna be in the game!
Colonies! (and all the awesome new features, but colonies above everything else)
I'm excited about the prospect of getting a free copy.
I can't wait to build super large ships and maybe not destroy my computer!

i'm exited about the interestellar travel and the colonies

 

i realy want to build a colony on eve

Oh man. I think what I'm most excited about is the new game UI and all the other details that were added. Huge props to the team for putting details like that into this game, can't wait to enjoy every moment of them.
I can't wait to fly through the new clouds!  The fact they're stock makes me really happy. The future looks bright and beautiful for KSP!

I just can't wait !

Full rewrite, physics, graphics, immersion, exploration, interstellar, colonies...to name a few !

Edited February 23, 2023 by dueb
I'm excited for multiplayer so i can compete with my friends!
I am very excited about interstellar travel, I have always wanted to experience the vastness of space between the stars
I am excited for the new parts and colonies.

I'm excited about the aspect of interstellar travel. I've been mesmerized by the possibility of humans eventually having the capability of visiting other systems for research or colonization. Ksp has been my pride and joy since I first played it and I can't wait to play the second one.
Originally I just wanted to see the clouds. But going to Dres actually is #1 on my list of places to see. THE RINGS!!!
Super excited for the new graphics!
NEW WINGS!
I am excited for mods i hope all my favorite mods from ksp 1 will be ported to ksp 2
